acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should create POJOs in accordance with custom data provider strategies
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldCreatePojosInAccordanceWithCustomDataProviderStrategies

user-story.name: Random data provider strategy impl initialisation unit test

tag.name: Random data provider strategy impl initialisation unit test
Random data provider strategy impl initialisation unit test

test-step.description: Given a Custom Random Data Provider Strategy
Given a Podam Factory with custom data provider strategy
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.PojoWithMapsAndCollections
Then the Object should not be null
Then the array of the given type should not be null or empty and contain exactly gRz2wyN5Xc} elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly true elements
Then the map should not be null or empty
Then the map should have exactly 1757671380=333522652976471 elements
